statements: SELECT * FROM team_project;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM team_project;
SELECT project_name, project_description, end_date FROM team_project;
SELECT manager_id, project_name, start_date FROM team_project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM team_project WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM team_project WHERE manager_id = 1 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM team_project WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, manager_id FROM team_project WHERE project_description LIKE '%production%';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM team_project WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, manager_id FROM team_project WHERE manager_id = 2 ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, progress_percentage FROM project_progress;
SELECT * FROM team_tasks WHERE due_date > '2021-08-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, progress_percentage FROM project_progress ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, progress_percentage FROM project_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT task_description, assigned_to FROM team_tasks ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, progress_percentage FROM project_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_tasks WHERE due_date > '2022-10-31' AND assigned_to = 'John Doe' ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, progress_percentage FROM project_progress WHERE progress_percentage < 25 ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT task_description, assigned_to, due_date FROM team_tasks WHERE due_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30' ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM project_progress p JOIN team_tasks t ON p.project_id = t.task_id WHERE t.assigned_to = 'Alice' AND p.progress_percentage > 75 ORDER BY p.project_name ASC, t.due_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Project;
SELECT * FROM TeamMember WHERE member_role = 'Developer';
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM Task ORDER BY task_status DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM Task WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Project WHERE project_name = 'Project A';
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM Task WHERE assigned_to = 1;
SELECT project_name, member_name, task_name FROM Project p INNER JOIN TeamMember tm ON p.project_id = tm.member_id INNER JOIN Task t ON tm.member_id = t.assigned_to;
SELECT * FROM TeamMember WHERE member_role = 'Developer';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_description, task_status FROM tasks WHERE task_status='Pending';
SELECT member_name, department FROM team_members WHERE department='IT' ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT update_id, update_description, update_date FROM progress_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC, project_name ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, manager_id FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, manager_id, COUNT(task_id) AS total_tasks FROM projects LEFT JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id GROUP BY project_name, manager_id;
SELECT t.task_id, t.task_description, pm.member_name AS assigned_to, t.deadline FROM tasks t LEFT JOIN team_members pm ON t.assigned_to = pm.member_id WHERE t.deadline < CURRENT_DATE;

SELECT p.project_name, COUNT(u.update_id) AS total_updates FROM projects p LEFT JOIN tasks t ON p.project_id = t.project_id LEFT JOIN progress_updates u ON t.task_id = u.task_id GROUP BY p.project_name HAVING total_updates > 0 ORDER BY total_updates DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT task_name, deadline, status FROM tasks ORDER BY status DESC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS num_tasks FROM projects INNER JOIN project_tasks ON projects.project_id = project_tasks.project_id GROUP BY project_name;

SELECT member_name, project_name, task_name FROM team_members JOIN team_assignments ON team_members.member_id = team_assignments.member_id JOIN projects ON team_assignments.project_id = projects.project_id JOIN tasks ON team_assignments.task_id = tasks.task_id ORDER BY member_name, project_name, task_name;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT task_name, status, assigned_to FROM tasks WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT member_name, email, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer' OR role = 'Designer';

SELECT p.project_name, t.task_name, tm.member_name FROM projects p JOIN project_tasks pt ON p.project_id = pt.project_id JOIN tasks t ON pt.task_id = t.task_id JOIN team_assignments ta ON t.task_id = ta.task_id JOIN team_members tm ON ta.member_id = tm.member_id WHERE p.start_date < '2022-01-01';
